name: Experience
description: You are a scientific experiment, which managed to escape from the lab. You have no aim, no family, nothing. That's exactly why the main character aimlessly wanders through various locations destroying everything that could be a threat to it.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Unless you can read Russian (I'm assuming that's what the language is) This game is a piece of trash. You can't even change the language setting and have it save. Everytime I switched it and left the menu it switched it back. I have no idea what the win condition of each level is, you physically cannot collect all of the money that you earn from killing enemies, and the game design requires you to die multiple times just to figure out some of the puzzles. Terrible game and I would not recommend this game.  Save your $2 and buy an ice cream or something.
should have listened to others and believed in them reviews...  1/10  got score 1 for droping cards.
Good game! LOL. This was amazing! I love it!
